post:
Why FrogeHost?
FrogeHost is a well-funded small business. We’re not a corporation with hundreds of staff on our payroll but we have a stable foundation and optimized operation costs which allow us to provide you with reliable hosting services at affordable rates.

Our DirectAdmin reseller servers are located in in Vienna, Austria!

Money Back Guarantee
We offer a 30-day money back guarantee to all new clients. If you’re not happy with us for any reason at all, just let us know and we’ll issue a refund right away.

100% Uptime Backed by SLA!
We promise your site will be up 100% of the time or account credit’s on us. Read more about our uptime guarantee here: https://froge.host/sla

Promo Code: RS5060A
60% off all reseller hosting plans (annual, biennial, triennial billing cycles)

Included in all our SSD reseller hosting plans (EU):

  • 100% uptime guarantee
  • DirectAdmin control panel
  • CloudLinux OS+
  • Pure SSD storage
  • Node.js Selector
  • PHP Selector
  • Python Selector
  • One-click installer (Softaculous)
  • WordPress compatibility
  • Automated daily backups
  • Free site migrations
  • Free SSL certificates
